title: Court Turns Down Happy the Elephant's Bid for Freedom
itunes:title: Court Turns Down Happy the Elephant's Bid for Freedom
description:
Elizabeth Stein, an attorney with the Nonhuman Rights Project, discusses New York's highest court, in a divided decision, turning down their case to get Happy the Elephant recognized as a legal person entitled to protection against unlawful imprisonment and released from the Bronx Zoo where she lives alone in a one acre exhibit.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
